docs.snippet: Mrs. Clinton appeared with Mr. Kaine in Miami, who peppered his remarks with Spanish in a bid to woo Hispanic voters in the swing state of Florida....
docs.lead_paragraph: Mrs. Clinton appeared with Mr. Kaine in Miami, who peppered his remarks with Spanish in a bid to woo Hispanic voters in the swing state of Florida.
docs.abstract: Hillary Clinton announces Virginia Sen Tim Kaine as her vice presidential running mate, drawing praise from some but disappointment from liberal Democrats; liberals criticize Kaine's support for global trade deals like Trans-Pacific Partnership.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton and Tim Kaine Debut Ticket in Battleground of Florida
headline.print_headline: Clinton Introduces Kaine, Drawing Roars but Unease

byline.contributor: Amy Chozick reported from Miami, and Alan Rappeport from Washington. Jonathan Martin contributed reporting from Philadelphia.
byline.original: By AMY CHOZICK and ALAN RAPPEPORT

docs.snippet: Some prominent Democrats had called for the Democratic National Committee chairwoman to step down in the wake of emails revealing the party’s attempts to undermine Bernie Sanders’s presidential bid....
docs.lead_paragraph: Some prominent Democrats had called for the Democratic National Committee chairwoman to step down in the wake of emails revealing the party’s attempts to undermine Bernie Sanders’s presidential bid.
docs.abstract: Democratic National Committee chairwoman Debbie Wasserman Schultz, on eve of Democratic National Convention, abruptly resigns in wake of 20,000 leaked emails showing party officials plotting to sabotage Sen Bernie Sanders's presidential campaign; resignation, combined with pro-Sanders protests in Philadelphia, threatens healing process from bitter campaign battle between Sanders and Hillary Clinton.

headline.main: Debbie Wasserman Schultz to Resign D.N.C. Post
headline.print_headline: Leaks Bring Down a Democratic Leader

byline.contributor: Maggie Haberman, Trip Gabriel and Yamiche Alcindor contributed reporting.
byline.original: By JONATHAN MARTIN and ALAN RAPPEPORT

docs.snippet: On the heels of a tumultuous Republican convention, Hillary Clinton arrives in Philadelphia eager to show off a forward-looking Democratic Party united behind her steady leadership. To do that, she must overcome lingering bitterness among supporte...
docs.lead_paragraph: On the heels of a tumultuous Republican convention, Hillary Clinton arrives in Philadelphia eager to show off a forward-looking Democratic Party united behind her steady leadership. To do that, she must overcome lingering bitterness among supporters of defeated rival Bernie Sanders and clean up a resurgent political mess of the party's own making.

headline.main: On Their Convention's Eve, Democrats Bedeviled Anew by Email
headline.print_headline: On Their Convention's Eve, Democrats Bedeviled Anew by Email
